eggnog : a drink made from milk, sugar, and eggs, often mixed with alcohol such as brandy or rum: This nog has all the flavour and creaminess of eggnog, but with far less fat. Use vanilla extract for an alcohol-free nog.
More examplesFewer examplesShe got up at 6 a.m. on Christmas morning to prepare a litre of nog.We wanted to share our vegan version of nog with tofu and cinnamon.Freshly grated nutmeg is great on your holiday nog.
